text: Teal is a blue-green color; a dark cyan. Teal gets its name from the colored area around the eyes of the common teal, a member of the duck family. The first written use of Teal as a color name in English was in 1917. Maerz and Paul A Dictionary of Color New York:1930 McGraw-Hill Page 205; color sample of Teal: Page 101 Plate 39 Color Sample L7 ==Comparison of green, teal, blue and ultramarine == Name Color HEX
